verbose_text: We have undertaken a systematic analysis of data from an experiment involving multisite ECoG / LFP recordings of the cortico-basal ganglia circuit that contains signals from a group of dopamine-intact control rats and a separate group of rats with chronic dopamine depletion induced by a unilateral injection of 6-OHDA.
evidence: dopamine depletion induced by a unilateral injection of 6-OHDA
